AI_MODE_EXTREME_DESC:
An improved version of the hard AI which already starts predicting its plays at the first card.
NOTE: The AI will become slower over time, because it does more checks the more turns have passed.
AI_MODE_HARD_DESC:
A harder AI which starts predicting its plays at the second card.
This AI stores all played cards into a vector of pairs and can check all played cards and play them if it finds a match.
AI_MODE_RANDOM_DESC:
A simple AI using a pseudo-random number generator.
This AI is the fastest, but also easiest to beat.
CARDSET_SELECTOR_CONFIRM: Do you want to use this card set?
CHARSET_SELECTOR_CONFIRM: Do you want to use this character set?
CREDITS_SPECIAL_THANKS_NS: For having the idea to use cubic bezier for animations, the falling cards animation on the game start and other suggestions.
CREDITS_SPECIAL_THANKS_PK11: For helping me with an example on how to flip a card in 2D and other suggestions.
CREDITS_SPECIAL_THANKS_UM: For better teaching me how cubic bezier works with an example and other suggestions.
EXIT_COMBINATION_TITLE: Hold the keys which would exit the game
GAME_SETTINGS_CARD_DELAY_TXT: Set how long to show the cards after selecting a pair.
GAME_SETTINGS_ROUND_WIN_TXT: Set the number of rounds you must win to win the game.
RULES_DESC:
Select 2 cards each turn, if they show the same image you've got a pair, otherwise it's your opponent's turn.

The player with the most pairs wins, though ties are also possible if an even number of pairs is used.
